WorkItem.Description:

i have tried on its sample but not found the any response from it. 
is there any one know about it please help me out, i just want to unlock my win 7 workstation from my windows service i will pass all credential from my windows service.
Â 
Locking is done now i m seeking for unlock win 7.
if some body knows any thing regarding it please help me out. Thanks in advance.
WorkItem.Summary: how to unlock win 7 using window service.
